title: Morning Routine
description: A person describes their simple morning routine
transcript: Hi! My name is Emma. Every morning I wake up at seven o'clock. I get up and go to the bathroom. I brush my teeth and wash my face. Then I have breakfast. I eat toast and drink coffee. After breakfast, I get dressed. I put on my clothes and shoes. Then I go to work. I take the bus. My morning is simple but nice.

questions.question: What time does Emma wake up?
What does Emma eat for breakfast?
Emma drinks tea in the morning.
Emma goes to work by bus.
